page_content: The page provides FAQs about the State Archives of the Canton of Bern, including archival practices and services.
The page provides legal disclaimers and data protection information for the website of the Education and Culture Directorate of the Canton of Bern.
The page announces awards for Helvetiarockt and the Berner MÃ¼nster Children and Youth Choir, focusing on their contributions to the Swiss music industry and choral music, respectively.
The page discusses various governmental decisions, including one about digital administration and the use of Open-Source Software.
The page provides legal disclaimers and data protection information for the website of the Office for Municipalities and Spatial Planning.
The page discusses new services offered by the Cantonal Tax Administration, including TaxMe-Online Tour, a guide for filling out tax forms electronically.
The page provides legal disclaimers and data protection information for the website of the Office for Migration and Civil Status.
The page provides information on how to obtain a special permit for organizing events in the hospitality industry in the Canton of Bern.
The page provides legal disclaimers and data protection information for the Ideenpool KliWa website.
The page provides information on E-Banking Trojans, how they operate, and offers guidelines for protection against such malware.
